title: Reflective Practice Training Program for Evidence-Based Practice (EBP) Implementation in Social Welfare Organizations

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Social Welfare Concepts and Field Experience
context.additional_context: Participants role-play as ordinary citizens in an environment enabling digital device-supported resource sharing and discussions

learning_goals: Learners can explain core principles of EBP (integrating research evidence, professional expertise, and service user experiences)
Learners can analyze real-world cases and propose improvements using EBP tools in workplace settings
Through reflective practice, learners can evaluate their work methods and document at least three examples of double-loop learning

resources: Evidence-Based Practice (EBP) Workbook and Case Studies

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
